Sure, here's a recipe for a classic Italian dish that is fairly simple and easy to prepare - Spaghetti Aglio e Olio:

Ingredients:
- 1 pound spaghetti
- 3 cloves garlic, sliced thinly
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley
- Red pepper flakes, to taste
- Parmesan cheese, grated

Instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
2. In a large skillet over medium heat, cook garlic in olive oil until it becomes fragrant and lightly golden brown.
3. Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the garlic and olive oil. Toss the pasta until it's evenly coated.
4. Add chopped parsley and red pepper flakes to the skillet and toss again until everything is well combined.
5. Serve hot with grated Parmesan cheese.

This recipe is quick, easy, and has tons of flavor with just a few simple ingredients. You can also experiment with adding other ingredients like cherry tomatoes, spinach, or shrimp to make it even more delicious. Enjoy!
